abstract: It takes an experienced sailor to recognize the sounds on a research vessel, separating the noises from various pieces of equipment and noting the loss of one or the gain of another.
snippet: It takes an experienced sailor to recognize the sounds on a research vessel, separating the noises from various pieces of equipment and noting the loss of one or the gain of another.
lead_paragraph: Bernard Coakley, a marine geologist with the University of Alaska at Fairbanks, writes from the Arctic Ocean, where his team is reconstructing the geologic history of the Chukchi Shelf and the Chukchi Borderland.
